info.name: 1d4chan Dark
info.description:
Like reading articles, but haven't gone outside for the past five years? No problem!

This style aims to make the wiki have a dark theme that is much easier on the eyes. (Okay, it might still make your eyes bleed but it won't be because of bright colors, it's just me being terrible at design.)

If you find something that looks god-awful, please leave me some feedback so I can fix it.
info.additionalInfo:
1.3 - Fixed various table colors.
1.2 - View Source tab fixed, File TOC fixed, Image Metadata table fixed, Search fixed. Galleries fixed, wiki tables fixed (Daniel Devac).
1.1 - Color tweaking, added settings for color themes. Fixed collapsible elements (thanks Daniel Devac for finding)
1.0 - Initial Release

data.title: Few problems that could use fixing
